We’re offering $52K — $70K a year,full benefits, sign on bonus, and you’ll be home weekly. Please apply if you have at least 2 years of OTR experience and a 3 year clean driving record.

JLE Driver Benefits

When you drive for JLE, you’ll get a host of great benefits. We have one of the lowest driver turn-over rates in the industry because of our executive level benefits for all of our drivers.

Base Pay
  • Industry leading pay.
  • Our top drivers earn over $70K/yr.
  • Average drivers earn over $59K/yr.
Bonus Pay
  • $1,000 sign on bonus.
  • Monthly performance bonuses.
Additional Compensation
  • Tarp pay.
  • Stop pay.
  • Layover pay.
  • Detention pay.
  • Breakdown pay.
Benefits
  • Employer sponsored health and Dental.
  • Employer paid vision, life, short & long term disability.
  • 401K with company match.
Hometime & Vacation Days JLE Driver
  • Home weekly or more depending on location.
  • Paid vacation.
  • Paid holidays.
Equipment
  • Brand new fleet vehicles.

Hiring Locations

We’re currently looking for OTR drivers within a 500 mile radius in and around Dunbar, PA in the United States of America.

JLE Driver Testimonials

We treat our drivers right and we have one of the industry’s lowest driver turn over rate which says all you need to know of how we value drivers like yourself. Check out what our drivers say about us!

Bradley Smith
JLE Driver

"Hi, my name is Bradley Smith, AKA ‘Buford’. I would like to share why I enjoy working at JLE Industries. First and foremost is the pay. I make 52 cents per mile at my experience level. The dispatch ensures that I get home often to see my family. My wife considers the ‘executive style’ benefits to be the best part of my job. We have the best insurance plan offered in the industry and paid vacations and an employer matching 401K. I am always treated with respect. We drive new tractors and trailers that are equipped with everything I need to do my job. Dispatch does their very best to send me where I want to go and have me home when I need to be home. The executives have an open door policy. Nowhere have I worked could I walk into the executives’ offices and resolve an issue. They have an open door policy."

Mark Moser
JLE Driver

"Newer equipment, great atmosphere and ability to earn a good living. I have enjoyed the time I spent at JLE Industries. I look forward to several more years helping the company grow."
